pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is a process monitor and system monitor.
- Full support across Linux, MacOS, FreeBSD and OpenBSD. - Process Listing. - Single-process view. - Start/stop/kill individual process. - Process PID, UID, name, thread count, memory use, nice, priority, state, CPU ID and CPU usage. - CPU monitoring. - Memory monitoring. - Disk usage monitoring. - Network usage monitoring. - CPU temperature monitoring. - Battery and power status.
